name: backendless-console-sdk
description: Backendless Console SDK for Node.js and browser

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/backendless-console-sdk.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/backendless-console-sdk.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run check && npm run build
